# Day 1182

![Good Ol Propoganda (but hey it's true!)](https://miro.medium.com/1*48wpJkUc96q9wlDBTHYLzQ.png)

Fiat money's like that cousin who borrows 20 bucks and pays you back in Monopoly money..."It's legal tender bro!!!!!" Nah, fam, that's just vibes on life support. Bitcoin's the group chat that nobody can hack. Every transaction's logged, locked, and loaded on a blockchain that's more honest than your grandma's book club. Bitcoin miners are out here turning spare wind and solar into cold, hard crypto, while fiat's got skyscrapers full of paper-pushers burning electricity to print more IOUs. Bitcoin's a roller-coaster with thrills, chills, and maybe some spills, but fiat's the haunted house where the ghosts are real and they're all named "hidden fees." Saving in fiat feels like bailing out a sinking ship with a teaspoon - every year your cash buys less, like it's on a mission to ghost you. Bitcoin's not perfect, but it's a vault where your keys mean your coins, with no middleman sneaking a cut. Fiat says "Chill, we got you," while Bitcoin says "Prove me wrong" - one's a rigged game, the other's a fair fight.

6/16/25

Conor Jay Chepenik
